answers.answer: I got the same results. I Dont see it as a big deal at all. I'm just taking my iron. I'm glad I Dont have GD lol

I have anemia as well, it can be very annoying! I am always really tired and dizzy along with feeling severe nausea from being pregnant. Just keep taking your iron pills and get rest when you need it. Eat lots of food high in iron as well!
I have anemia and i agree with @jillianeileen I feel really dizzy and tired too they gave me some pills I have to take everyday but I try not to worry too much (:

question: I got the call from my doctor today that I don't have gestational diabetes! I passed with a 98.. So I'm good. However, I'm slightly anemic and need to take 3 iron supplements, calcium, and a stool softener :(((Anyone going through anemia? And have suggestions?
title: Good news and bad news (GD and anemia)
